trans-unit.source: Represents an elliptical arc between two points.
trans-unit.target: Representa um arco elíptica entre dois pontos.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> object to store ArcSegment objects and other segments.
trans-unit.target: Utilize um <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>objeto para armazenar objetos ArcSegment e outros segmentos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>

trans-unit.source: An elliptical arc is defined by its start and end points, x- and y-radius, x-axis rotation factor, a value indicating whether the arc should be greater than 180 degrees, and a value describing the direction in which the arc is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Um arco elíptica é definido pela respetiva pontos inicial e final, x - e y-radius, eixo x rotação fator de um valor que indica se o arco deve ser superior a 180 graus e um valor que descrevem a direção em que o arco é desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The ArcSegment class does not contain a property for the starting point of the arc; it only defines the destination point of the arc it represents.
trans-unit.target: A classe de ArcSegment não contém uma propriedade para o ponto de partida de arco; apenas define o ponto de destino de arco representa.

trans-unit.source: The beginning point of the arc is the current point of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> to which the ArcSegment is added.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de início do arco é o ponto de atual do <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>que é adicionado o ArcSegment.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>

trans-unit.source: The following illustrations demonstrate the different end point, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle%2A> settings.
trans-unit.target: As ilustrações seguintes demonstram o ponto final diferente, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle%2A>definições.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![ArcSegments with different Point settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-point.png "ArcSegments with different Point settings") ![ArcSegments with different Size settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-size.png "ArcSegments with different Size settings") ![ArcSegments with different RotationAngle settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-rotationangle.png "ArcSegments with different RotationAngle settings") ## IsLargeArc and SweepDirection For most arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> properties indicate which arc to use.
trans-unit.target: ![ArcSegments com diferentes definições de ponto](~/add/media/arcsegment-point.png "ArcSegments com diferentes definições de ponto")![ArcSegments com diferentes definições de tamanho](~/add/media/arcsegment-size.png "ArcSegments com diferentes definições de tamanho")![ArcSegments com diferentes definições de RotationAngle](~/add/media/arcsegment-rotationangle.png "ArcSegments com diferentes definições de RotationAngle") # # IsLargeArc e SweepDirection para a maioria das arcos de um determinado posição, o tamanho e a rotação, existem quatro arcos diferentes que podem ser desenhados; o <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>Propriedades indicam qual arco a utilizar.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>

trans-unit.source: Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less.
trans-unit.target: De sweeps de arco em quatro candidato, dois representam grandes arcos com sweeps igual ou superior a 180 graus e dois representam arcos mais pequenos com sweeps 180 graus ou menos.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A> is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>é **verdadeiro**, então, um de dois sweeps arco maior é escolhido; caso contrário, se é **falso**, um do arco de menor sweeps é escolhido.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>

trans-unit.source: The remaining two arc candidates are each drawn in a different direction: <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>.
trans-unit.target: Candidatos de arco dois em restantes são cada desenhados uma direção diferentes: <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> property specifies which one to use.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>propriedade especifica qual delas utilizar.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustrations show different <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> settings.
trans-unit.target: As ilustrações seguintes mostram diferentes <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>definições.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![ArcSegments with different IsLargeArc settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-islargearc.png "ArcSegments with different IsLargeArc settings") ArcSegment objects with different IsLargeArc settings ![ArcSegments with different SweepDirection settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-sweepdirection.png "ArcSegments with different SweepDirection settings") ArcSegment objects with different SweepDirection settings ## Freezable Features An ArcSegment is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
trans-unit.target: ![ArcSegments com diferentes definições de IsLargeArc](~/add/media/arcsegment-islargearc.png "ArcSegments com diferentes definições de IsLargeArc") ArcSegment objetos com diferentes definições de IsLargeArc ![ArcSegments com diferentes definições de SweepDirection](~/add/media/arcsegment-sweepdirection.png "ArcSegments com diferentes definições de SweepDirection") ArcSegment objetos com diferentes definições de SweepDirection # # Freezable ArcSegment um de funcionalidades é um tipo de <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>funcionalidades, como freezing e a clonagem, consulte o [descrição geral de objetos Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> class defines only the destination point of the arc it represents; the beginning point of the arc is the current point of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>, to which the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> is added.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>classe define o ponto de destino de arco representa; o ponto de início do arco é o ponto atual do <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>, a qual o <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>é adicionado.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>

trans-unit.source: For most elliptical arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the `largeArc` and `sweepDirection` parameters indicate which arc to use.
trans-unit.target: Para mais elíptica arcos de um determinado posição, o tamanho e a rotação, existem quatro arcos diferentes que podem ser desenhados; o `largeArc` e `sweepDirection` parâmetros indicam qual arco a utilizar.

trans-unit.source: Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less.
trans-unit.target: De sweeps de arco em quatro candidato, dois representam grandes arcos com sweeps igual ou superior a 180 graus e dois representam arcos mais pequenos com sweeps 180 graus ou menos.

trans-unit.source: If `largeArc` is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if `largeArc` is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen.
trans-unit.target: Se `largeArc` é **verdadeiro**, então, um de dois sweeps arco maior é escolhido; caso contrário, se `largeArc` é **falso**, um do arco de menor sweeps é escolhido.

trans-unit.source: If `sweepDirection` is <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>, the arc is drawn in a positive-angle direction.
trans-unit.target: Se `sweepDirection` é <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>, o arco é desenhado uma direção de ângulo positivos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>

trans-unit.source: If `sweepDirection` is <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>, the arc is drawn in a negative-angle direction.
trans-unit.target: Se `sweepDirection` é <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>, o arco é desenhado uma direção de ângulo negativo.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> class defines only the destination point of the arc it represents; the beginning point of the arc is the current point of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>, to which the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> is added.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>classe define o ponto de destino de arco representa; o ponto de início do arco é o ponto atual do <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>, a qual o <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>é adicionado.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>

trans-unit.source: For most elliptical arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the `largeArc` and `sweepDirection` parameters indicate which arc to use.
trans-unit.target: Para mais elíptica arcos de um determinado posição, o tamanho e a rotação, existem quatro arcos diferentes que podem ser desenhados; o `largeArc` e `sweepDirection` parâmetros indicam qual arco a utilizar.

trans-unit.source: Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less.
trans-unit.target: De sweeps de arco em quatro candidato, dois representam grandes arcos com sweeps igual ou superior a 180 graus e dois representam arcos mais pequenos com sweeps 180 graus ou menos.

trans-unit.source: If `largeArc` is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if `largeArc` is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen.
trans-unit.target: Se `largeArc` é **verdadeiro**, então, um de dois sweeps arco maior é escolhido; caso contrário, se `largeArc` é **falso**, um do arco de menor sweeps é escolhido.

trans-unit.source: If `sweepDirection` is <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>, the arc is drawn in a positive-angle direction.
trans-unit.target: Se `sweepDirection` é <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>, o arco é desenhado uma direção de ângulo positivos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>

trans-unit.source: If `sweepDirection` is <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>, the arc is drawn in a negative-angle direction.
trans-unit.target: Se `sweepDirection` é <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>, o arco é desenhado uma direção de ângulo negativo.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>

trans-unit.source: The destination point of the arc; the start point of the arc is defined as the current point of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref> to which the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment"></xref> is added.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de destino de arco; o ponto de início do arco está definido como o ponto de atual o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"> </xref> ao qual o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment"> </xref> é adicionado.

trans-unit.source: The x- and y-radius of the arc.
trans-unit.target: X - e y-raio do arco.

trans-unit.source: The x-radius is specified by the <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> structure's <xref:System.Windows.Size.Width*> property, and the y-radius is specified by the <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> structure's <xref:System.Windows.Size.Height*> property.
trans-unit.target: O radius x é especificado pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> da estrutura <> </> *> propriedade e o radius y especificada pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> da estrutura <> </> *> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The x-axis rotation of the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: A rotação do eixo x de elipse.

trans-unit.source: Whether the arc should be greater than 180 degrees.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o arco deve ser superior a 180 graus.

trans-unit.source: Set to <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection"></xref> to draw the arc in a positive angle direction; set to <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection"></xref> to draw the arc in a negative angle direction.
trans-unit.target: Definido como <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection"> </xref> para desenhar o arco num positivos ângulo direção; definido como <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection"> </xref> para desenhar o arco na direção de um ângulo negativo.

trans-unit.source: Set to `true` to stroke the arc when a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref> is used to render the segment; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: Definido como `true` para stroke o arco quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"> </xref> é utilizado para compor o segmento; caso contrário, `false`.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment"> </xref>, efetuar cópias profundas de valores deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Quando copiar propriedades de dependência, este método copia enlaces de referências e os dados de recursos (mas já não poderão resolver), mas não animações ou os respetivos valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Este método é utilizado para produzir modificável cópias congeladas <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua comodidade, este método funciona como sombra a versão herdada por uma implementação com tipo seguro.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> propriedade serão <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> , mesmo se a origem <> </> *> propriedade foi<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment"> </xref> objeto, tornando profundas cópias dos valores atuais deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: As referências de recurso, enlaces de dados e animações não são copiadas, mas são os seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Este método é utilizado para produzir modificável cópias congeladas <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua comodidade, este método funciona como sombra a versão herdada por uma implementação com tipo seguro.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> propriedade serão <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> , mesmo se a origem <> </> *> propriedade foi <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the arc should be greater than 180 degrees.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o arco em deve ser superior a 180 graus.

trans-unit.source: For most arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the IsLargeArc and <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> properties indicate which arc to use.
trans-unit.target: Para a maioria das arcos de um determinado posição, o tamanho e a rotação, existem quatro arcos diferentes que podem ser desenhados; o IsLargeArc e <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>Propriedades indicam qual arco a utilizar.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less.
trans-unit.target: De sweeps de arco em quatro candidato, dois representam grandes arcos com sweeps igual ou superior a 180 graus e dois representam arcos mais pequenos com sweeps 180 graus ou menos.

trans-unit.source: If IsLargeArc is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen.
trans-unit.target: Se IsLargeArc **verdadeiro**, então, um de dois sweeps arco maior é escolhido; caso contrário, se é **falso**, um do arco de menor sweeps é escolhido.

trans-unit.source: The remaining two arc candidates are each drawn in a different direction: <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>.
trans-unit.target: Candidatos de arco dois em restantes são cada desenhados uma direção diferentes: <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> property specifies which one to use.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>propriedade especifica qual delas utilizar.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows two elliptical arcs that are identical except for their IsLargeArc settings.
trans-unit.target: A seguinte ilustração mostra duas arcos elíptica idênticas, à exceção as respetivas definições IsLargeArc.

trans-unit.source: ![ArcSegments with different IsLargeArc settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-islargearc.png "ArcSegments with different IsLargeArc settings") ArcSegment objects with different IsLargeArc settings ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|None|
trans-unit.target: ![ArcSegments com diferentes definições de IsLargeArc](~/add/media/arcsegment-islargearc.png "ArcSegments com diferentes definições de IsLargeArc") ArcSegment objetos com diferentes definições de IsLargeArc # # informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados **verdadeiro**| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: **true** if the arc should be greater than 180 degrees; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **Verdadeiro** se o arco em deve ser superior a 180 graus; caso contrário, **falso**.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the endpoint of the elliptical arc.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o ponto final do arco elíptica.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> class defines only the destination point of the arc it represents; the beginning point of the arc is the current point of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> to which the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> is added.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>classe define o ponto de destino de arco representa; o ponto de início do arco é o ponto de atual do <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>ao qual o <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>é adicionado.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>

trans-unit.source: If the arc segment's start point and end point are the same, no arc is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Se o segmento de arco em ponto de início e ponto final forem iguais, sem arco é desenhado.

trans-unit.source: For most arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> properties indicate which arc to use.
trans-unit.target: Para a maioria das arcos de um determinado posição, o tamanho e a rotação, existem quatro arcos diferentes que podem ser desenhados; o <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>Propriedades indicam qual arco a utilizar.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>

trans-unit.source: Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less.
trans-unit.target: De sweeps de arco em quatro candidato, dois representam grandes arcos com sweeps igual ou superior a 180 graus e dois representam arcos mais pequenos com sweeps 180 graus ou menos.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A> is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>é **verdadeiro**, então, um de dois sweeps arco maior é escolhido; caso contrário, se é **falso**, um do arco de menor sweeps é escolhido.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>

trans-unit.source: The remaining two arc candidates are each drawn in a different direction: <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>.
trans-unit.target: Candidatos de arco dois em restantes são cada desenhados uma direção diferentes: <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> property specifies which one to use.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>propriedade especifica qual delas utilizar.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows several elliptical arcs that are identical except for their Point settings.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração seguinte mostra várias arcos elíptica idênticas, à exceção as definições de ponto.

trans-unit.source: ![ArcSegments with different Point settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-point.png "ArcSegments with different Point settings") Several ArcSegment objects with different Point settings ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|None|
trans-unit.target: ![ArcSegments com diferentes definições de ponto](~/add/media/arcsegment-point.png "ArcSegments com diferentes definições de ponto") ArcSegment vários objetos com diferentes definições de ponto # # informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados **verdadeiro**| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The point to which the arc is drawn.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de que o arco é desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The default value is (0,0).
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é (0,0).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount (in degrees) by which the ellipse is rotated about the x-axis.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a quantidade (em graus) através do qual será rodada elipse sobre o eixo x.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows several elliptical arcs that are identical except for their RotationAngle settings.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração seguinte mostra várias arcos elíptica idênticas, à exceção as respetivas definições RotationAngle.

trans-unit.source: ![ArcSegments with different RotationAngle settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-rotationangle.png "ArcSegments with different RotationAngle settings") Several ArcSegment objects with different RotationAngle settings Note that, if the arc's width and height are the same, setting this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: ![ArcSegments com diferentes definições de RotationAngle](~/add/media/arcsegment-rotationangle.png "ArcSegments com diferentes definições de RotationAngle") ArcSegment vários objetos com diferentes definições de RotationAngle tenha em atenção que, se o arco largura e altura forem iguais, definir esta propriedade não tem qualquer efeito.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados **verdadeiro**| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The amount (in degrees) by which the ellipse is rotated about the x-axis.
trans-unit.target: A quantidade (em graus) através do qual será rodada elipse sobre o eixo x.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é 0.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x- and y-radius of the arc as a <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o radius x e y de arco como um <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows several elliptical arcs that are identical except for their Size settings.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração seguinte mostra várias arcos elíptica idênticas, à exceção as respetivas definições de tamanho.

trans-unit.source: ![ArcSegments with different Size settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-size.png "ArcSegments with different Size settings") Several ArcSegment objects with different Size settings ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|None|
trans-unit.target: ![ArcSegments com diferentes definições de tamanho](~/add/media/arcsegment-size.png "ArcSegments com diferentes definições de tamanho") ArcSegment vários objetos com diferentes definições de tamanho # # informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados **verdadeiro**| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> structure that describes the x- and y-radius of the elliptical arc.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> estrutura que descreve o raio x e y do arco elíptica.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> structure's <xref:System.Windows.Size.Width*> property specifies the arc's x-radius; its <xref:System.Windows.Size.Height*> property specifies the arc's y-radius.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> da estrutura <> </> *> propriedade especifica x-radius o arco; <> </> *> propriedade especifica y-radius o arco.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0,0.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é 0,0.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the arc is drawn in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection"></xref> direction.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica se o arco é desenhado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection"> </xref> direção.

trans-unit.source: For an <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> with a given <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle%2A>, start point, and end <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point%2A>, four different arcs are possible.
trans-unit.target: Para um <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>com uma determinada <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle%2A>, ponto inicial e final <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point%2A>, quatro arcos diferentes são possíveis.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>

trans-unit.source: Specifying the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A> property reduces the number of possible arcs to two: an arc drawn from the start point to the end <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point%2A> in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection> direction and an arc drawn from the start point to the end point in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection> direction.
trans-unit.target: Especificar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>propriedade reduz o número de arcos possíveis para duas: um arco desenhado a partir do ponto de início ao fim <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point%2A>num <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>direção e um arco desenhada a partir do ponto de início para o ponto final num <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>direção.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows two elliptical arcs that are identical except for their SweepDirection settings.
trans-unit.target: A seguinte ilustração mostra duas arcos elíptica idênticas, à exceção as respetivas definições SweepDirection.

trans-unit.source: ![ArcSegments with different SweepDirection settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-sweepdirection.png "ArcSegments with different SweepDirection settings") ArcSegment objects with different SweepDirection settings ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|None|
trans-unit.target: ![ArcSegments com diferentes definições de SweepDirection](~/add/media/arcsegment-sweepdirection.png "ArcSegments com diferentes definições de SweepDirection") ArcSegment objetos com diferentes definições de SweepDirection # # informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados **verdadeiro**| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies the direction in which the arc is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que especifica a direcção em que o arco é desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
